concept.title: Installation and tests execution in Airflow

conbody.p: In Airflow NCC installation is done using workflows defined in the workflow configuration package. Test suites execution on the other hand can be done in two ways in Airflow. One way is using workflows in the workflow configuration package. The other way is using variables defined in the Airflow GUI. This chapter describes how to perform installation and run test suites in Airflow.
